long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the festive spirit to your Chrome with this animated Christmas tree and fireplace live wallpaper!

Add warmth and joy to your browser with the "Noel Ağacı Şömine Animasyonlu Duvar Kağıdı." This live wallpaper features a beautifully decorated Christmas tree beside a cozy, crackling fireplace, creating the perfect holiday atmosphere. Watch the flames dance and the tree twinkle, bringing the magic of Christmas directly to your browser.

**Key Features:**
- **Popular Website Shortcuts**: Access your favorite sites directly from the wallpaper with built-in shortcuts.
- **Date and Time Display**: Stay on schedule with a stylish clock and date feature integrated seamlessly into the holiday scene.

This extension is perfect for those who love the holiday season and want to add a touch of festive cheer to their browsing experience. Download "Noel Ağacı Şömine Animasyonlu Duvar Kağıdı" today and bring the warmth and magic of Christmas to your tabs!
